title: Proof of delivery (POD) and delivery receipts
dataVerified: Carrier, consignee, delivery address, signature/photo proof, timestamp
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake POD (claim goods never delivered). Domain binding verifies carrier. Tamper-evident delivery proof. Prevents delivery fraud. Real-time verification by consignee.
